DOC.brief_summary: Other effects of fluvastatin are investigated in German patients with metabolic syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Other Effects of Fluvastatin Are Investigated in Patients With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent Male and female patients, aged between 18 and 75 years Metabolic syndrome according to National Cholesterol Education Program Adult Treatment Panel III (NCEP ATPIII) History of heart failure HIV positive Stroke Other protocol defined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
